page.title: 14A DAY IN THE LIFE OF KATIE
page.content: My dad usually wakes me with a cup of tea at 7.00 am. I then get washed and dressed and have breakfast of Cereals and Tea. I then catch the School bus to go to school. The journey takes about 45 mins. I sit on the back seat of the bus. School starts at 9.00. At 9.15 we have French then Religion and English. After 15 mins Break we have Maths. At 12.00 we have Dinner. We have a '5 Star' canteen system. We then have a Break till 1.00. After that we have Craft or Science. On Wednesday we have Games - usually Rounders or Netball for the Girls - Football for the Boys. I get home about 4.00. I watch T.V. have my Tea, do some Reading and any other homework and go to bed at about 9.30.
